meanings.definition: The study of the biological bases of behavior and mental processes.
meanings.sent1: In psychobiologies, researchers explore how the brain influences our actions.
meanings.sent2: Psychobiologies is an important field that combines biology and psychology.
meanings.sent3: The class on psychobiologies made me realize how our brains control our behaviors.
meanings.sent4: Her interest in psychobiologies blossomed when she discovered its impact on human behavior.
meanings.sent5: Studying psychobiologies helps us understand the connection between biology and behavior.

meanings.definition: The branch of psychology that deals with the biological aspects of behavior.
meanings.sent1: Psychobiologies focuses on how biology influences our actions in psychology.
meanings.sent2: Understanding psychobiologies is crucial for comprehending the link between biology and behavior.
meanings.sent3: The quirky professor always made his psychobiologies lectures entertaining.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of the mind, psychobiologies is the root that nourishes our understanding of behavior.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on psychobiologies provided a clear explanation of biological influences on behavior.
